<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Check if unit is stopped by [[stop]] command.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[Boolean]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''stopped''' unitName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>  unitName: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>? (stopped _loon1) : [[hint]] "Loon1 is stopped"</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[stop]]
</value></part></template>
